metadata.title: CVE-2024-23851 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
copy_params in drivers/md/dm-ioctl.c in the Linux kernel through 6.7.1 canattempt to allocate more than INT_MAX bytes, and crash, because of amissing param_kernel->data_size check. This is related to ctl_ioctl.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic - 5.4.0-175.195~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-175.195~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-152-lowlatency - 5.4.0-175.195~18.04.1
